mapper.insert: insert into tbl_auction_log (id, station_real_id, board_real_id, token, auction_times_name, board_name, auction_time, local_auction_id,auction_car_id,car_id,customer_id,bid_fee, price_type,enable,parent_id,create_person,create_time) values (#{id}, #{stationRealId}, #{boardRealId}, #{token}, #{auctionTimesName}, #{boardName}, #{auctionTime}, #{localAuctionId},#{auctionCarId},#{carId},#{customerId},#{bidFee}, #{priceType},#{enable},#{parentId}, #{createPerson}, #{createTime})
